description_short.en: Monterosso's beloved annual celebration transforms the village into a golden paradise of lemons, featuring competitions, tastings, and the famous '8000 Steps in Lemon Scent' culinary walk.
description_short.de: Monterossos geliebtes jährliches Fest verwandelt das Dorf in ein goldenes Zitronenparadies mit Wettbewerben, Verkostungen und dem berühmten kulinarischen Spaziergang '8000 Schritte im Zitronenduft'.
description_short.it: L'amata celebrazione annuale di Monterosso trasforma il borgo in un paradiso dorato di limoni, con gare, degustazioni e la famosa passeggiata culinaria '8000 passi nel profumo di limone'.
description_short.fr: La célébration annuelle bien-aimée de Monterosso transforme le village en paradis doré de citrons, avec des concours, des dégustations et la fameuse promenade culinaire '8000 pas dans le parfum du citron'.

description_long.en: Every May, when the Mediterranean spring reaches its golden peak, Monterosso transforms into a citrus wonderland that would make even Eugenio Montale's poetic heart sing. The Lemon Festival isn't merely a celebration—it's a love letter to the terraced hillsides where these precious yellow gems have grown for centuries, their branches heavy with fruit that captures the essence of Ligurian sunshine. The narrow caruggi burst with the intoxicating scent of fresh lemons as locals compete to crown the largest fruit and most creative lemon sculpture. Street vendors offer everything from silky limoncello to delicate lemon cream pastries, while the traditional '8000 Steps in Lemon Scent' walk takes visitors through hidden corners where the poet himself once wandered, each step perfumed with the distinctive aroma that has defined this corner of paradise for generations.
description_long.de: Jeden Mai, wenn der mediterrane Frühling seinen goldenen Höhepunkt erreicht, verwandelt sich Monterosso in ein Zitrus-Wunderland, das selbst Eugenio Montales poetisches Herz zum Singen bringen würde. Das Zitronenfest ist nicht nur ein Fest—es ist ein Liebesbrief an die terrassierten Hügel, wo diese kostbaren gelben Juwelen seit Jahrhunderten wachsen. Die engen Caruggi platzen vor dem berauschenden Duft frischer Zitronen, während Einheimische um die größte Frucht und kreativste Zitronenskulptur konkurrieren. Der traditionelle Spaziergang '8000 Schritte im Zitronenduft' führt Besucher durch verborgene Ecken, wo der Dichter selbst einst wandelte.
description_long.it: Ogni maggio, quando la primavera mediterranea raggiunge il suo apice dorato, Monterosso si trasforma in un paese delle meraviglie degli agrumi che farebbe cantare persino il cuore poetico di Eugenio Montale. La Sagra del Limone non è semplicemente una celebrazione—è una lettera d'amore alle colline terrazzate dove questi preziosi gioielli gialli crescono da secoli. I caruggi stretti esplodono del profumo inebriante di limoni freschi mentre i locali gareggiano per incoronare il frutto più grande e la scultura di limone più creativa.
description_long.fr: Chaque mai, quand le printemps méditerranéen atteint son apogée dorée, Monterosso se transforme en pays des merveilles des agrumes qui ferait chanter même le cœur poétique d'Eugenio Montale. La Fête du Citron n'est pas simplement une célébration—c'est une lettre d'amour aux coteaux en terrasses où ces précieux joyaux jaunes poussent depuis des siècles. Les caruggi étroits explosent du parfum enivrant de citrons frais tandis que les habitants rivalisent pour couronner le plus gros fruit et la sculpture de citron la plus créative.

details.history: Established as an annual tradition since 1967, the Lemon Festival celebrates the agricultural heritage that has defined Monterosso for generations. The festival honors the 'Limun de Munterussu' that once called out by street vendors, precious fruits often gifted to friends and family.
details.significance: The festival represents the deep connection between Monterosso's identity and its lemon cultivation, immortalized in the poetry of Nobel laureate Eugenio Montale who celebrated these 'yellow diamonds' in his verses.

description_short.en: Monterosso's celebration of its prized blue fish features street-side frying stations serving golden, crispy anchovies paired with local white wine.
description_short.de: Monterossos Feier seines geschätzten blauen Fisches bietet Bratereien am Straßenrand, die goldene, knusprige Sardellen mit lokalem Weißwein servieren.
description_short.it: La celebrazione di Monterosso del suo pregiato pesce azzurro offre stazioni di frittura lungo le strade che servono acciughe dorate e croccanti abbinate al vino bianco locale.
description_short.fr: La célébration de Monterosso de son précieux poisson bleu propose des stations de friture le long des rues servant des anchois dorés et croustillants accompagnés de vin blanc local.

description_long.en: As June's warm evenings descend upon Monterosso, the village awakens to the irresistible sizzle of fresh anchovies meeting hot olive oil in massive outdoor frying pans. This isn't just a food festival—it's a tribute to the small blue fish that has sustained this fishing community for generations. The Monterosso anchovy, with its silvery flanks and black-blue back, possesses a delicate sweetness that locals claim is unmatched anywhere along the Mediterranean coast. Watch skilled fishermen's wives work their magic as they coat each fish in flour and drop them into golden pools of bubbling oil, the aroma wafting through the narrow medieval streets. Paired with a crisp glass of Cinque Terre DOC white wine and served on simple paper plates, these golden morsels represent the purest expression of Ligurian coastal cuisine—simple, honest, and utterly divine.
description_long.de: Wenn die warmen Juniabende über Monterosso hereinbrechen, erwacht das Dorf zum unwiderstehlichen Brutzeln frischer Sardellen, die auf heißes Olivenöl in riesigen Freiluft-Bratpfannen treffen. Das ist nicht nur ein Essensfest—es ist eine Hommage an den kleinen blauen Fisch, der diese Fischergemeinschaft seit Generationen ernährt hat.
description_long.it: Quando le calde serate di giugno scendono su Monterosso, il borgo si risveglia al suono irresistibile delle acciughe fresche che incontrano l'olio d'oliva bollente nelle grandi padelle all'aperto. Questo non è solo un festival gastronomico—è un tributo al piccolo pesce azzurro che ha sostenuto questa comunità di pescatori per generazioni.
description_long.fr: Lorsque les chaudes soirées de juin descendent sur Monterosso, le village s'éveille au grésil irrésistible des anchois frais rencontrant l'huile d'olive chaude dans d'énormes poêles en plein air. Ce n'est pas seulement un festival gastronomique—c'est un hommage au petit poisson bleu qui a soutenu cette communauté de pêcheurs pendant des générations.

description_short.en: September's harvest celebration honors the ancient art of anchovy preservation, featuring traditional salted anchovy tastings and demonstrations of time-honored curing techniques.
description_short.de: Die Ernte-Feier im September ehrt die alte Kunst der Sardellenkonservierung mit traditionellen gesalzenen Sardellen-Verkostungen und Demonstrationen zeitgerechter Pökeltechniken.
description_short.it: La celebrazione del raccolto di settembre onora l'antica arte della conservazione delle acciughe, con degustazioni tradizionali di acciughe salate e dimostrazioni di tecniche di salatura antiche.
description_short.fr: La célébration de la récolte de septembre honore l'art ancien de la conservation des anchois, avec des dégustations d'anchois salés traditionnels et des démonstrations de techniques de salaison ancestrales.

description_long.en: As September's golden light bathes the Mediterranean, Monterosso celebrates one of its most precious traditions—the ancient art of anchovy preservation. This festival pays homage to the skilled hands that have transformed fresh catch into liquid silver for centuries, layering delicate fish with coarse sea salt in wooden barrels that will cure through winter months. The salted anchovy was once the backbone of Monterosso's economy, traded like precious currency with mountain villages hungry for protein during harsh winters. Today's festival showcases this culinary alchemy, where visitors can witness master salters demonstrate techniques passed down through generations, their weathered fingers working with the precision of sculptors. Tastings reveal the complex, umami-rich flavors that emerge from this patient process—anchovies so intensely flavored they dissolve on the tongue like edible ocean essence.
description_long.de: Als das goldene Licht des September das Mittelmeer badet, feiert Monterosso eine seiner kostbarsten Traditionen—die alte Kunst der Sardellenkonservierung. Dieses Festival ehrt die geschickten Hände, die seit Jahrhunderten frischen Fang in flüssiges Silber verwandelt haben.
description_long.it: Mentre la luce dorata di settembre bagna il Mediterraneo, Monterosso celebra una delle sue tradizioni più preziose—l'antica arte della conservazione delle acciughe. Questo festival rende omaggio alle mani esperte che per secoli hanno trasformato il pescato fresco in argento liquido.
description_long.fr: Alors que la lumière dorée de septembre baigne la Méditerranée, Monterosso célèbre l'une de ses traditions les plus précieuses—l'art ancien de la conservation des anchois. Ce festival rend hommage aux mains expertes qui ont transformé les prises fraîches en argent liquide pendant des siècles.

description_short.en: One of Monterosso's most beautiful religious celebrations transforms cobblestone streets into elaborate flower carpets, followed by a solemn evening procession through the historic center.
description_short.de: Eine der schönsten religiösen Feiern Monterossos verwandelt Kopfsteinpflasterstraßen in kunstvolle Blumenteppiche, gefolgt von einer feierlichen Abendprozession durch das historische Zentrum.
description_short.it: Una delle più belle celebrazioni religiose di Monterosso trasforma le strade di ciottoli in elaborati tappeti di fiori, seguita da una solenne processione serale attraverso il centro storico.
description_short.fr: L'une des plus belles célébrations religieuses de Monterosso transforme les rues pavées en tapis de fleurs élaborés, suivie d'une procession solennelle du soir à travers le centre historique.

description_long.en: When dawn breaks on Corpus Domini, Monterosso awakens to one of the most breathtaking transformations in the Christian calendar. Throughout the night, devoted villagers have worked by lamplight to create intricate infiorata—elaborate tapestries woven from thousands of flower petals, colored salt, coffee grounds, and flour. These ephemeral masterpieces carpet the narrow medieval streets in brilliant patterns that rival any cathedral's stained glass windows. As morning light illuminates these fleeting works of art, families gather to admire designs that will soon be blessed by the feet of the faithful during the evening procession. The celebration reaches its crescendo as the Blessed Sacrament is carried through streets perfumed with crushed petals, while ancient hymns echo off stone walls that have witnessed this sacred ritual for centuries.
description_long.de: Wenn die Morgendämmerung am Corpus Domini anbricht, erwacht Monterosso zu einer der atemberaubendsten Verwandlungen im christlichen Kalender. Die ganze Nacht über haben hingebungsvolle Dorfbewohner bei Lampenlicht gearbeitet, um kunstvolle Infiorata zu schaffen—aufwändige Wandteppiche, die aus Tausenden von Blütenblättern gewebt sind.
description_long.it: Quando l'alba irrompe nel Corpus Domini, Monterosso si risveglia a una delle trasformazioni più mozzafiato del calendario cristiano. Durante tutta la notte, i devoti abitanti del borgo hanno lavorato alla luce delle lampade per creare elaborate infiorata—arazzi intricati tessuti con migliaia di petali di fiori.
description_long.fr: Quand l'aube se lève sur le Corpus Domini, Monterosso s'éveille à l'une des transformations les plus époustouflantes du calendrier chrétien. Toute la nuit, les villageois dévoués ont travaillé à la lueur des lampes pour créer des infiorata élaborées—des tapisseries complexes tissées de milliers de pétales de fleurs.

description_short.en: Monterosso's most sacred celebration honors its patron saint with a traditional beach bonfire on June 23rd and a solemn procession with floating candles on June 24th.
description_short.de: Monterossos heiligste Feier ehrt seinen Schutzpatron mit einem traditionellen Strandfeuer am 23. Juni und einer feierlichen Prozession mit schwimmenden Kerzen am 24. Juni.
description_short.it: La celebrazione più sacra di Monterosso onora il suo santo patrono con un tradizionale falò sulla spiaggia il 23 giugno e una solenne processione con candele galleggianti il 24 giugno.
description_short.fr: La célébration la plus sacrée de Monterosso honore son saint patron avec un feu de joie traditionnel sur la plage le 23 juin et une procession solennelle avec des bougies flottantes le 24 juin.

description_long.en: As the summer solstice approaches, Monterosso prepares for its most mystical and ancient celebration—the feast of San Giovanni Battista, patron saint of both fishermen and the village itself. The festivities begin on the magical night of June 23rd, when locals gather on Fegina beach to burn the Battiston, a traditional rag puppet that symbolically carries away the year's misfortunes. The great bonfire crackles against the darkening sky while families share stories and children dance around the flames, their laughter mixing with the sound of lapping waves. The following evening brings the procession's climax, as the saint's statue is carried through narrow streets lit by thousands of candles. The most enchanting moment comes when children push hundreds of luminarias—small floating candles—into the gentle Mediterranean waters, creating a constellation of lights that bob on the dark sea like fallen stars, carrying prayers and wishes toward the horizon.
description_long.de: Mit der Annäherung der Sommersonnenwende bereitet sich Monterosso auf seine mystischste und älteste Feier vor—das Fest des San Giovanni Battista, Schutzpatron sowohl der Fischer als auch des Dorfes selbst. Die Feierlichkeiten beginnen in der magischen Nacht des 23. Juni, wenn sich Einheimische am Fegina-Strand versammeln, um den Battiston zu verbrennen.
description_long.it: Con l'avvicinarsi del solstizio d'estate, Monterosso si prepara per la sua celebrazione più mistica e antica—la festa di San Giovanni Battista, santo patrono sia dei pescatori che del borgo stesso. I festeggiamenti iniziano nella notte magica del 23 giugno, quando i locali si riuniscono sulla spiaggia di Fegina per bruciare il Battiston.
description_long.fr: Alors que le solstice d'été approche, Monterosso se prépare pour sa célébration la plus mystique et ancienne—la fête de San Giovanni Battista, saint patron à la fois des pêcheurs et du village lui-même. Les festivités commencent dans la nuit magique du 23 juin, quand les habitants se rassemblent sur la plage de Fegina pour brûler le Battiston.

details.history: The feast of San Giovanni Battista has been celebrated in Monterosso for centuries, combining ancient midsummer traditions with Catholic devotion. The burning of the Battiston puppet and floating candles ceremony reflect pre-Christian solstice rituals adapted to Christian celebrations.
details.significance: Represents the spiritual heart of Monterosso, combining ancient solstice traditions with Catholic faith, and serving as the most important religious celebration for the fishing community

description_short.en: Italy's most sacred summer holiday transforms into a spiritual mountain pilgrimage to Liguria's oldest sanctuary, combining centuries-old devotion with breathtaking panoramic views.
description_short.de: Italiens heiligster Sommerfeiertag verwandelt sich in eine spirituelle Bergwallfahrt zum ältesten Heiligtum Liguriens und verbindet jahrhundertealte Hingabe mit atemberaubenden Panoramablicken.
description_short.it: La festa estiva più sacra d'Italia si trasforma in un pellegrinaggio spirituale di montagna al santuario più antico della Liguria, unendo una devozione secolare a panorami mozzafiato.
description_short.fr: La fête d'été la plus sacrée d'Italie se transforme en pèlerinage spirituel de montagne vers le plus ancien sanctuaire de Ligurie, alliant une dévotion séculaire à des vues panoramiques à couper le souffle.

description_long.en: On the holiest day of Italian summer—Ferragosto, the Feast of the Assumption—Monterosso's faithful embark on a pilgrimage that has remained unchanged for centuries. The journey begins at dawn in the village church, where pilgrims gather before ascending the ancient mule paths that wind through terraced vineyards and olive groves toward the Sanctuary of Madonna di Soviore, perched 465 meters above the sparkling Mediterranean. This sanctuary, the oldest in all of Liguria, holds within its medieval walls a miraculous wooden statue discovered by a dove's guidance in 740 AD. The pilgrimage path, perfumed with wild rosemary and maritime pine, reveals spectacular vistas at every turn—on clear days, the view stretches from Corsica to the Maritime Alps. At the sanctuary, pilgrims participate in Holy Mass, traditional stalls offer local delicacies, and folk music echoes through the mountain air, creating a perfect fusion of spiritual devotion and communal celebration.
description_long.de: Am heiligsten Tag des italienischen Sommers—Ferragosto, dem Fest Mariä Himmelfahrt—begeben sich Monterossos Gläubige auf eine Wallfahrt, die seit Jahrhunderten unverändert geblieben ist. Die Reise beginnt im Morgengrauen in der Dorfkirche, wo sich Pilger versammeln, bevor sie die alten Maultierpfade hinaufsteigen.
description_long.it: Nel giorno più santo dell'estate italiana—Ferragosto, la Festa dell'Assunzione—i fedeli di Monterosso intraprendono un pellegrinaggio rimasto immutato per secoli. Il viaggio inizia all'alba nella chiesa del paese, dove i pellegrini si riuniscono prima di salire gli antichi sentieri mulattieri.
description_long.fr: Au jour le plus saint de l'été italien—Ferragosto, la Fête de l'Assomption—les fidèles de Monterosso entreprennent un pèlerinage inchangé depuis des siècles. Le voyage commence à l'aube dans l'église du village, où les pèlerins se rassemblent avant de gravir les anciens sentiers muletiers.

details.history: The pilgrimage to Madonna di Soviore dates back to 740 AD when the wooden statue was miraculously discovered. The sanctuary is the oldest in Liguria and has been a place of pilgrimage for over 1,200 years, with the Ferragosto celebration being particularly significant.
details.significance: Represents the deepest spiritual tradition of Monterosso, connecting the village to Liguria's oldest sanctuary and maintaining centuries-old pilgrimage traditions on Italy's most sacred summer holiday

name.en: Cinque Terre: A Sea of Books Literary Festival

description_short.en: An enchanting literary festival that transforms Monterosso's harbor and seaside venues into intimate open-air libraries where renowned authors share their works against the backdrop of the Mediterranean sunset.
description_short.de: Ein bezauberndes Literaturfestival, das Monterossos Hafen und Küstenschauplätze in intime Freilichtbibliotheken verwandelt, wo renommierte Autoren ihre Werke vor der Kulisse des Mittelmeer-Sonnenuntergangs teilen.
description_short.it: Un incantevole festival letterario che trasforma il porto e i luoghi costieri di Monterosso in biblioteche all'aperto intime dove autori rinomati condividono le loro opere sullo sfondo del tramonto mediterraneo.
description_short.fr: Un festival littéraire enchanteur qui transforme le port et les lieux côtiers de Monterosso en bibliothèques intimes en plein air où des auteurs renommés partagent leurs œuvres sur fond de coucher de soleil méditerranéen.

description_long.en: As twilight paints the Mediterranean in shades of gold and rose, Monterosso transforms into a literary sanctuary where the written word meets the eternal poetry of the sea. The ninth edition of 'Cinque Terre: A Sea of Books' creates an extraordinary fusion of literature and landscape, where celebrated authors present their latest works on intimate stages set against fishing boats, ancient harbor walls, and terraced vineyards. The festival's crown jewel is the Fishermen's Pier, where readers gather as stars emerge to listen to stories that seem to emerge from the very waves that have witnessed centuries of human drama. From contemporary novels to historical narratives, each evening offers a different literary voyage, curated by Marco Ferrari with the support of the Cinque Terre National Park and local municipalities, creating an atmosphere where books become living experiences and the Mediterranean itself becomes a character in every story.
description_long.de: Während die Dämmerung das Mittelmeer in Gold- und Rosatönen malt, verwandelt sich Monterosso in ein literarisches Heiligtum, wo das geschriebene Wort auf die ewige Poesie des Meeres trifft. Die neunte Ausgabe von 'Cinque Terre: Ein Meer von Büchern' schafft eine außergewöhnliche Fusion von Literatur und Landschaft.
description_long.it: Mentre il crepuscolo dipinge il Mediterraneo in tonalità d'oro e rosa, Monterosso si trasforma in un santuario letterario dove la parola scritta incontra l'eterna poesia del mare. La nona edizione di 'Cinque Terre: Un Mare di Libri' crea una fusione straordinaria di letteratura e paesaggio.
description_long.fr: Alors que le crépuscule peint la Méditerranée en nuances d'or et de rose, Monterosso se transforme en sanctuaire littéraire où le mot écrit rencontre la poésie éternelle de la mer. La neuvième édition de 'Cinque Terre: Une Mer de Livres' crée une fusion extraordinaire de littérature et de paysage.

details.history: The literary festival was established to celebrate the deep literary connections of the Cinque Terre, particularly honoring Nobel Prize winner Eugenio Montale who found inspiration in these very landscapes. Now in its ninth edition, it has become a prestigious cultural event.

name.en: Il Tempo del Racconto - The Time of Storytelling
name.de: Il Tempo del Racconto - Die Zeit des Erzählens
name.fr: Il Tempo del Racconto - Le Temps du Récit

schedule.schedule_notes: Two-day festival typically held in mid-September

location.address: Oratorio Mortis et Orationis and Fishermen's Pier, Monterosso al Mare, SP

description_short.en: A unique festival that blends literature, culinary traditions, and community storytelling, transforming Monterosso into an open-air museum celebrating local culture and narratives.
description_short.de: Ein einzigartiges Festival, das Literatur, kulinarische Traditionen und Gemeinschaftserzählungen verbindet und Monterosso in ein Freilichtmuseum verwandelt, das lokale Kultur und Erzählungen feiert.
description_short.it: Un festival unico che fonde letteratura, tradizioni culinarie e narrazione comunitaria, trasformando Monterosso in un museo a cielo aperto che celebra cultura e narrazioni locali.
description_short.fr: Un festival unique qui mélange littérature, traditions culinaires et narration communautaire, transformant Monterosso en musée à ciel ouvert célébrant la culture et les récits locaux.

description_long.en: Il Tempo del Racconto represents the evolution of cultural festivals in the Cinque Terre, where stories become the bridge between past and present, tradition and innovation. This extraordinary two-day celebration transforms Monterosso into a living narrative, where every corner tells a story and every encounter becomes an opportunity for cultural exchange. The festival weaves together the threads of Ligurian heritage through food historian dialogues, traditional anchovy salting demonstrations that preserve dialect and identity, and evening storytelling sessions that awaken all five senses. The collaboration with renowned writer Stefano Massini brings contemporary literary voices to ancient settings, while local participants share oral traditions that have been passed down through generations, creating an authentic fusion of high culture and grassroots storytelling that reflects the true spirit of sustainable, mindful tourism.
description_long.de: Il Tempo del Racconto repräsentiert die Evolution kultureller Festivals in den Cinque Terre, wo Geschichten zur Brücke zwischen Vergangenheit und Gegenwart, Tradition und Innovation werden. Diese außergewöhnliche zweitägige Feier verwandelt Monterosso in eine lebendige Erzählung.
description_long.it: Il Tempo del Racconto rappresenta l'evoluzione dei festival culturali nelle Cinque Terre, dove le storie diventano il ponte tra passato e presente, tradizione e innovazione. Questa straordinaria celebrazione di due giorni trasforma Monterosso in una narrazione vivente.
description_long.fr: Il Tempo del Racconto représente l'évolution des festivals culturels dans les Cinque Terre, où les histoires deviennent le pont entre passé et présent, tradition et innovation. Cette extraordinaire célébration de deux jours transforme Monterosso en récit vivant.

details.history: Il Tempo del Racconto was established as a cultural initiative to preserve and celebrate the storytelling traditions of the Cinque Terre while promoting sustainable tourism and community engagement through narrative arts.
details.significance: Represents innovative cultural programming that preserves local traditions while fostering contemporary artistic expression and sustainable tourism practices

name.en: Madonna di Soviore Descent - Once Every 25 Years
name.de: Madonna di Soviore Abstieg - Alle 25 Jahre
name.it: Discesa della Madonna di Soviore - Ogni 25 Anni
name.fr: Descente de la Madonna di Soviore - Tous les 25 Ans

schedule.schedule_notes: Extraordinary event occurring only once every 25 years, documented since 1749

location.venue_name: Sanctuary to Church of San Giovanni Battista
location.address: From Sanctuary di Soviore to Chiesa San Giovanni Battista, Monterosso al Mare, SP

description_short.en: An extraordinary religious event that happens only once every 25 years, when the miraculous statue of Madonna di Soviore descends from Liguria's oldest sanctuary to the village in a week-long celebration of faith and community.
description_short.de: Ein außergewöhnliches religiöses Ereignis, das nur alle 25 Jahre stattfindet, wenn die wundersame Statue der Madonna di Soviore vom ältesten Heiligtum Liguriens ins Dorf hinabsteigt in einer einwöchigen Feier des Glaubens und der Gemeinschaft.
description_short.it: Un evento religioso straordinario che accade solo ogni 25 anni, quando la statua miracolosa della Madonna di Soviore scende dal santuario più antico della Liguria al borgo in una celebrazione settimanale di fede e comunità.
description_short.fr: Un événement religieux extraordinaire qui n'arrive qu'une fois tous les 25 ans, quand la statue miraculeuse de la Madonna di Soviore descend du plus ancien sanctuaire de Ligurie vers le village dans une célébration d'une semaine de foi et de communauté.

description_long.en: In 2025, Monterosso will witness one of the most extraordinary and rare religious events in all of Italy—the descent of the Madonna di Soviore, an occurrence so special it happens only once every 25 years. This tradition, documented since a papal bull by Pius VII in 1749, represents the deepest spiritual connection between the village and Liguria's oldest sanctuary. For eight sacred days, the miraculous wooden statue that was discovered by divine guidance in 740 AD will leave her mountain sanctuary 465 meters above the sea and journey down ancient paths to rest in the Church of San Giovanni Battista. The entire community participates in this living pilgrimage, as the narrow alleys of Monterosso come alive with chants, prayers, and the shared footsteps of locals and visitors united in devotion. This is more than a religious ceremony—it's a profound meeting point that unites faith, memory, and community, transforming the village into a place of gathering, celebration, and spiritual renewal that will be remembered for the next quarter-century.
description_long.de: Im Jahr 2025 wird Monterosso eines der außergewöhnlichsten und seltensten religiösen Ereignisse in ganz Italien erleben—den Abstieg der Madonna di Soviore, ein Ereignis so besonders, dass es nur alle 25 Jahre stattfindet. Diese Tradition, dokumentiert seit einer päpstlichen Bulle von Pius VII. im Jahr 1749.
description_long.it: Nel 2025, Monterosso sarà testimone di uno degli eventi religiosi più straordinari e rari di tutta Italia—la discesa della Madonna di Soviore, un evento così speciale che accade solo ogni 25 anni. Questa tradizione, documentata fin da una bolla papale di Pio VII nel 1749.
description_long.fr: En 2025, Monterosso sera témoin de l'un des événements religieux les plus extraordinaires et rares de toute l'Italie—la descente de la Madonna di Soviore, un événement si spécial qu'il n'arrive qu'une fois tous les 25 ans. Cette tradition, documentée depuis une bulle papale de Pie VII en 1749.

details.history: This extraordinary tradition dates back to 1749 when Pope Pius VII established by papal bull that the miraculous statue should be carried down from the sanctuary to the village church every 25 years, making it one of Italy's rarest religious celebrations.
details.significance: Represents the most sacred and rare religious event in Monterosso's calendar, occurring only once in a generation and maintaining a 275-year-old tradition of community faith and devotion

description_short.en: An extremely demanding 47km trail running race that celebrates the precious Sciacchetrà wine, following ancient paths through all five Cinque Terre villages with 2,600 meters of elevation change.
description_short.de: Ein extrem anspruchsvolles 47km Traillaufrennen, das den kostbaren Sciacchetrà-Wein feiert und alten Pfaden durch alle fünf Cinque Terre-Dörfer mit 2.600 Metern Höhenunterschied folgt.
description_short.it: Una corsa di trail estremamente impegnativa di 47km che celebra il prezioso vino Sciacchetrà, seguendo antichi sentieri attraverso tutti e cinque i borghi delle Cinque Terre con 2.600 metri di dislivello.
description_short.fr: Une course de trail extrêmement exigeante de 47km qui célèbre le précieux vin Sciacchetrà, suivant d'anciens sentiers à travers les cinq villages des Cinque Terre avec 2.600 mètres de dénivelé.

description_long.en: As spring awakens the terraced vineyards of the Cinque Terre, the most challenging athletic event of the year transforms these ancient coastal paths into an arena for human endurance and determination. The Sciacchetrail is far more than a running race—it's a pilgrimage through living history, where participants follow footsteps worn smooth by centuries of vineyard workers who tended the steep terraces that produce Sciacchetrà, the region's precious passito wine. This 47-kilometer odyssey with 2,600 meters of grueling elevation change takes runners on a complete circuit of all five villages, from Monterosso's beaches to Corniglia's clifftop perches, past ancient dry-stone walls and through vineyards that cling impossibly to near-vertical slopes. The race is as much about cultural celebration as athletic achievement, honoring both the landscape that has been sculpted by human hands for over a millennium and the liquid gold that emerges from these heroic vineyards, where every grape is hand-harvested from terraces that seem to defy gravity itself.
description_long.de: Während der Frühling die terrassierten Weinberge der Cinque Terre erweckt, verwandelt das herausforderndste sportliche Ereignis des Jahres diese alten Küstenpfade in eine Arena für menschliche Ausdauer und Entschlossenheit. Der Sciacchetrail ist weit mehr als ein Laufrennen—es ist eine Pilgerreise durch lebendige Geschichte.
description_long.it: Mentre la primavera risveglia i vigneti terrazzati delle Cinque Terre, l'evento atletico più impegnativo dell'anno trasforma questi antichi sentieri costieri in un'arena per la resistenza e determinazione umana. Il Sciacchetrail è molto più di una corsa—è un pellegrinaggio attraverso la storia vivente.
description_long.fr: Alors que le printemps réveille les vignobles en terrasses des Cinque Terre, l'événement athlétique le plus difficile de l'année transforme ces anciens sentiers côtiers en arène pour l'endurance et la détermination humaines. Le Sciacchetrail est bien plus qu'une course—c'est un pèlerinage à travers l'histoire vivante.

details.history: The Sciacchetrail celebrates both athletic achievement and the cultural heritage of Sciacchetrà wine production, taking runners through the historic terraced vineyards that have defined the Cinque Terre landscape for over 1000 years.
details.significance: Combines extreme athletic challenge with celebration of local wine culture and the heroic landscape of terraced vineyards that represent UNESCO World Heritage craftsmanship

main_attractions: 47km challenging trail race through all five villages

Bring appropriate trail running gear and hydration

Underestimating the physical demands of 2,600m elevation change
